instruction: Generate an appropriate response to this email.
input:
Dear [Name],

I am writing to thank you for your generous donation. Your contribution will have a tremendous impact on our organization and the work we do.

Thank you for your support!

Sincerely,
[Name]
output:
Dear [Name],

Thank you for your kind donation! You have truly enabled us to make a greater impact in our mission. We are very grateful for your support and generosity.

Warm regards,
[Name]
